name: Yoga
description: A mind-body practice combining physical postures, breathing techniques, and meditation to improve flexibility, strength, and mental focus.

name: Pilates
description: A low-impact exercise modality that focuses on core strength, flexibility, and controlled movements.

name: CrossFit
description: A high-intensity fitness program incorporating functional movements from multiple disciplines like weightlifting, cardio, and gymnastics.

name: Calisthenics
description: A modality based on bodyweight exercises such as push-ups, pull-ups, and dips to build strength and mobility.

name: Bodybuilding
description: A training system focused on muscle hypertrophy, symmetry, and definition through resistance training.

name: Functional Training
description: Designed to improve everyday movements and athletic performance through dynamic and practical exercises.

name: Martial Arts
description: Combines physical conditioning with self-defense techniques, discipline, and coordination through practices like Karate or Taekwondo.

name: Dance Fitness
description: A fun, rhythm-based modality such as Zumba or aerobic dance that blends cardiovascular exercise with choreography.

name: Athletic Training
description: Focuses on improving sport-specific performance, including speed, agility, and explosive power.

name: Rehabilitation
description: Exercise plans aimed at recovering mobility, strength, and function after injury or surgery.

name: Strength & Conditioning
description: A performance-focused modality used by athletes to build strength, prevent injury, and enhance physical readiness.

name: Water Fitness
description: Exercises performed in water environments to reduce joint impact while improving endurance and muscle tone.

name: Stretch Therapy
description: A specialized system to increase muscle flexibility, correct posture, and improve neuromuscular health.

name: Group Training
description: Instructor-led sessions in a group setting that foster motivation, accountability, and structured progress.

name: Home Workout
description: A flexible modality designed to be performed at home using minimal or no equipment.
